Name: Demon Fang Combat Knife
Description:
Manufacturer: Apocalypse Arms
Item Type: Knife
Class: Melee

Size: 15 cm

The Demon Fang is a simple yet sinister split blade knife supported by a sturdy and lightly textured handle. Vibrant red cutting edges highlight the knife's unusual and intimidating look, guaranteeing to give anyone second thoughts about getting in its way.
